entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries later this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 08:19 AM CST Tuesday 17 January 2023
